name: Musicians Institute
tag_list: music, school, college, contemporary-music, guitar, bass, drums, keyboard, vocals, professional-performance, recording, audio-engineering, film-production, the-music-industry
overview: The Musicians Institute in Hollywood, California was founded in 1977 as the Guitar Institute of Technology, with a curriculum originated by legendary jazz guitarist Howard Roberts. Today, it offers students and music lovers alike comprehensive hands-on, intensive bachelor and vocational courses in guitar, bass, keyboard, drums, vocals, audio engineering, professional performance, film production, guitar craft, and the music industry.
